election_record.label: Virginia 1801 Clerk of the House of Delegates

office.name: Clerk of the House of Delegates

role.title: Clerk of the House of Delegates

overview.note: "On Monday the General Assembly of Virginia convened. A quorum of the House of Delegates having qualified and taken their seats, Mr. Shield nominated Mr. William Wirt, who was unanimously elected Clerk." American. And Baltimore Daily Advertiser (Baltimore, MD). December 14, 1801.

election_record.reference: American. And Baltimore Daily Advertiser (Baltimore, MD). December 14, 1801.
Leonard, Cynthia Miller, ed. The General Assembly of Virginia, July 30, 1619 - January 11, 1978: A Bicentennial Register of Members. Richmond: Virginia State Library, 1978.
